itself.translation[0].definitions[0].def: used to show that a thing, organization, animal, or baby that does something is affected by its own action
itself.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The cat lay on the sofa, washing itself.
The machine switches itself off when the process is complete.
a small local enterprise that has transformed itself into a highly successful company
itself.translation[0].definitions[1].def: used to emphasize that you are talking about one particular thing, organization etc
